source_objects.title: Interior Design
source_objects.description: Learn how to layout your furniture, decorate, pick the right paint color, update your kitchen, and more.

items.title: Feng Shui The Easiest Way

visible_instructors.title: Glenda Feilen
visible_instructors.name: Glenda
visible_instructors.job_title: Law of Attraction & Feng Shui Expert

items.headline: How to Feng Shui home & office: have better health, attract supportive relationships and success.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will know how to Feng Shui your home quickly and on a budget
You will learn how to arrange your home so that it is balanced and harmonious
You will learn Feng Shui prosperity secrets so that you can make more money and attract more customers

items.title: Everything Small Home Design
items.headline: Small Home Living at its Best
objectives_summary: Great design tips/techniques for every room in your home, including your outdoor area
How to make your small rooms appear bigger
Best storage hacks for your small home

items.title: HVAC (PART2) with Revit MEP & Practical Projects
items.headline: your Practical Guide in the Heating Ventilation & Air Conditioning with Programs & Layouts (A Complete Project Included)
objectives_summary: Learn how to install a full free version of the Revit software !
Design any HVAC system for any type of buildings.
Design any HVAC shop drawings with the Revit software .

items.title: Mastering Interior Design Styles
items.headline: Criteria and Characteristics Of Different Interior Design Styles Simplified
objectives_summary: Identify different interior design styles. (Traditional, Rustic, Victorian, Art Deco, Hollywood Glam, Modern, Contemporary, Minimalist...etc)
Acknowledge the ideal interior space layout for each style.
Choose the adequate materials and finishes for the floor, walls and ceiling.

items.title: Store Design:  How to Design Successful Retail Stores
items.headline: Everything you need to know to create effective brick & mortar retail stores: Image, Display, Storefront, and Lighting.
objectives_summary: Design or evaluate any type of retail store, in any location using the tools and techniques presented in this Store Design course. You will learn how to convert your client’s image of the store into a three-dimensional reality show. To do this you will learn product presentation, store planning, storefront design and the special requirements of retail lighting.

This course is best suited for people who are designers, retailers, or real estate executives who can use this new knowledge to design a store or evaluate a retail store design. Architectural or interior design students can use the course as a basis for school projects. This course is only intended for "brick and mortar" stores, and is not for the design of on-line stores.

items.title: Intro to Photoshop for Interior Designers
items.headline: Getting Interior Designers up and running with Photoshop fast.
objectives_summary: You will have expert knowledge of Photoshop and have the advantage over the 99% of the people who don’t.
Will have a strong foundation of the Photoshop Interface.
Will be able to start implementing Photoshop into your daily interior design business workflow.

items.title: Houseplants 101: A Beginners Guide to Indoor Gardening
items.headline: Learn how to grow your own jungle at home and stop being afraid of houseplants!
objectives_summary: Indoor gardening
Taking care of plants
The importance of plants

items.title: Mastering Colour; Architectural Design & Interior Decoration

visible_instructors.name: Michael
visible_instructors.job_title: Architectural Designer with 20+ years of Industry Experience

items.headline: Great Design Begins With Colour - Every Time! Learn The Secrets Of Colour From An Architect And Interior Designer
objectives_summary: Have a working knowledge of color theory
Develop an appreciation of color application and experience
Develop a color vocabulary

items.title: SketchUp BootCamp:  Creating Interiors with SketchUp
items.headline: Learn SketchUp with this Comprehensive, Easy-to-follow, and Fun Guide  to Designing and Presenting Interior Spaces.
objectives_summary: Understand how to communicate with SketchUp  to create any 3D model.
Utilize SketchUp to efficiently model interiors for design planning and presentation

visible_instructors.job_title: Elite of engineers in all Fields specially Elec Engineering

items.headline: The easiest way to be a pro Engineer, you'll learn Dialux, AutoCAD, ETAP, Excel and Cummins software for Gen Sizing
objectives_summary: How to use Dialux program for making interior lighting design
How to use the AutoCAD program
Generator Sizing Concept and Using Software of Cummins

items.title: Styling and Staging Interior Spaces
items.headline: Interior styling and staging is the key to character and interest in interior projects.
objectives_summary: Styling and Staging Interior Spaces

items.title: Design Principles and Elements in Interiors
items.headline: The Role of Design Principles and Elements in Interior Decorating & Design
objectives_summary: Design Principles & Elements and how they can be used to create harmonious interiors.

items.title: Interior Decorating: An A-Z System For Your Home

visible_instructors.name: Alisa
visible_instructors.title: Alisa Connely
visible_instructors.job_title: Interior Designer and Paint Color Specialist

items.headline: Everything You Need to Know to Start Decorating and Designing Your Home Like a Pro
objectives_summary: You Will Learn What Your Unique Interior Design Style Is, As We Run Through The 8 Major Design Styles Being Used Now.
You Will Learn What Colors & Neutrals To Use Within Your Unique Design Style, And How Many To Use Of Each
You Will Learn My Unique Formulas For Decorating Fireplace Mantles, Bookcases, All Shelving, Coffee Tables, Console Tables, Above Kitchen Cabinets and More!

items.title: Interior Design with Revit for Beginners
items.headline: Interior Design Projects from Scratch using Revit
objectives_summary: Deliver a complete Interior Design package to a client.
Create 2d and 3d Interior Designs
Setup complete and compelling sheets to publish

items.title: Materials and Finishes in Interior Design
items.headline: All you need to know about the materials and finishes used in interior spaces for ceiling, walls and floors.
objectives_summary: All about wood: Type of wood paneling, Choice of wood, Surface wood finish and types of hardwood flooring.

All about stones and tiles: Types of stone cladding, Types of textures and finishes, Installation types, Natural stone vs veneer stone  Different types of natural stones and their characteristics, Different types of tiles and their uses.
All about paint: Types of paint and their best uses, Paint sheen options, Other types of paints, Special paints for special jobs, Faux finishes and types of epoxy floors.

items.title: SketchUp & Twilight for Interior Designers
items.headline: A workflow & organisation system to maximise efficiency of modelling and producing both technical drawings and renders
objectives_summary: Start each SketchUp project with a ready-made feature-rich template file
Switch quickly and easily between views that are custom made for Interior Designers
Turn on and off specific parts of their models, whether it be Architectural details such as 'furniture' or conceptual details such as 'existing architecture'
